description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the installation error encountered when applying the Windows 10 update:

1. Verify if the PC has a recovery partition. If it does not, you can safely ignore the error code 0x80070643 (error_install_failure) that occurs during the update process.
2. Monitor for upcoming releases from Microsoft, as they are working on a resolution for this issue.

**Details**:
- This error typically indicates that the update is not applicable for systems lacking a recovery partition. It is essential to confirm the system configuration before retrying the update.
- Keep an eye on the relevant KB article (KB-5034441) for further updates and resolution details. (LLM Synthesized)
